Action.author: mastersingh24
Action.body: ~sky5217285 - Can you provide some more details on your setup? Would also be helpful to see the logs for the orderer as well

Action.author: jyellick
Action.body: Most likely, the orderer has not been bootstrapped with the correct profile (or is not running).

Action.author: clayton sims
Action.body: ~sky5217285 are you able to provide the info? moving to hold/monitor status which means we are waiting on the originator
